review.title: “Good people”
review.pros: Pros – Good employees that care about youGreat oppurtunitiesUtilizes modern tech allowing for everything to be done online
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Ok but not Great”
review.pros: Pros – Easy to work for, health benefits for contractors
review.cons: Cons – Lack of communication. Hard to get in contact with support reps.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Reach out to your staff from time to time Spend some time helping them to develope their careers.

review.title: “salary for remote coder”
review.pros: Pros – different hospitals to code for the company. meet knew people. learn new softwear. travel to cities throughout the united states of america.
review.cons: Cons – work is not a full time basis. short term positions have been in my history with them. no education at all has been provided to help with the implementation on icd-10.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – find more fulltime positions for remote coders

review.title: “If you need work it is ok”
review.pros: Pros – It was a job and pay was good
review.cons: Cons – No communication - or very little feedback.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get to know your employee's or contractors, get better benifits. Offer a little something

review.title: “Never Again.”
review.pros: Pros – benefits, some good leaders, but more bad then good.
review.cons: Cons – incompetent management team and major hypocrisy
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Take a real deep look internally and holistically.

review.title: “It is great, pay is great, recruiters are superb at handling any concerns or issues”
review.pros: Pros – Competitive salaries at the best companies
review.cons: Cons – None yet that I can speak on.

review.title: “It's okay”
review.pros: Pros – They sent me for short assignment
review.cons: Cons – No other work assigned to me

review.title: “good”
review.pros: Pros – none, good benefits, good people
review.cons: Cons – none recently been bought by a different company

review.title: “ok..love the people.”
review.pros: Pros – Nice people to work with. Christian radio supporters
review.cons: Cons – Small, may be dropped or let go..
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep your best employees and drop the under performers

review.title: “Just another consulting company”
review.pros: Pros – Takes good care of all the paperwork involved in H1B Transfers.Initial communication is good.Time Monitoring is online and hassle free.Salaries are paid in timely manner and are accurate.
review.cons: Cons – Once you are on board the communication declines drastically.There are some rules related to Time Off that are not stated in advance...

review.title: “Login”
review.pros: Pros – Professional I.T staffing and pays timely
review.cons: Cons – pays less but take care of employees
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep it up your good work
